docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Following is a transcript of President Reagan's news conference last night n Washington, as recorded by The New York Times: OPENING STATEMENT

headline.main: President's News Conference on Foreign and Domestic Issues

docs.snippet: LEAD: Following is a transcript of President Reagan's news conference last night n Washington, as recorded by The New York Times:  OPENING STATEMENT

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Starting Saturday, life will change for the 24 million residents of California. Almost daily, they will receive pointed reminders about the chemical risks of the good life of the 20th century in the nation's largest state.

headline.main: New Law Will Warn Californians Of Chemical Risks of Modern Life

docs.snippet: LEAD: Starting Saturday, life will change for the 24 million residents of California. Almost daily, they will receive pointed reminders about the chemical risks of the good life of the 20th century in the nation's largest state.

byline.original: By ROBERT REINHOLD, Special to the New York Times
